notes: Tribunal Members are apex individuals; Council is a Filter gating next-level ontology.
MC retains a planned veil-crack at a cost (debt-mark). Auditor can detect anomalies.

visual_notes: Cosmic courtroom suspended in starfield void.
Floor: black stone ring etched with permission-sigils (legal seals + cultivation arrays).
One Tribunal Member seat visible; emits subtle spirit pressure + will levitation cues.
Council ring behind 'The Filter' (refractive lattice); Council bodies appear as fractured geometry.
Celestial Ledger floats center with PERMITTED/REVOKED/DEFERRED stamps.
One Council seat faintly vacant (seed later arc).

on_panel_text: Prior Judgements: Reversion x2 — Recurrence confirmed
visual_notes: Ledger lines write themselves in glowing ink.
Stamps visible: PERMITTED / REVOKED / DEFERRED as sharp sigils.
Tribunal Member raises hand; sleeve woven from drifting script.
Script-light spirals into a circular Writ Seal with 5 nested rings (five pillars encoded).

panels.thought: Still treating me like a criminal… when I helped write the laws.
visual_notes: MC stands centered in permission-sigil circle.
Spirit pressure cue: dust grains flatten outward in ripples.
Will cue: a pebble levitates near his ankle.
Authority cue: sigils faintly respond like a lock sensing a key.

dialogue: Third hearing. Same room. Same ritual.
Which of you is assigned to my leash this time?
visual_notes: MC amused expression; tiny flicker of concern when sensing Council presence.

dialogue.speaker: COUNCIL_VOICE_3
dialogue.text: You reached our threshold twice. You learned nothing twice.

visual_notes: The Filter dominates frame: refractive lattice, fractured silhouettes behind.
Council speech bubbles refract/split; occasional words smear into sigils.
Emphasize faintly vacant seat in Council ring.
Word 'rejected' triggers a brief REVOKED stamp flicker on the Filter.
Veil of Mercy descends like silk threads made of code + mist toward MC's brow/eyes.
Internal silhouette hint: a library of symbols beginning to shut.

dialogue.speaker: COUNCIL_VOICE_FAINT
dialogue.text: Let the mortal ladder teach what the peak could not.

visual_notes: World-sized glyph stamp slams down; panel borders crack/tilt.
Body: aura collapses into flesh/breath.
Spirit: pressure shuts off (sound muffles).
Will: levitating debris drops.
Law/Authority: permission circle inverts; marks MC as DENIED.
Reality trapdoor opens beneath MC.
Angel-cast iconography: robe fragments flare into torn wing-shapes made of unraveling Authority glyphs.
Wings are not feathers: scripted light and sigils unspooling.
Cosmic court recedes above like a bright cathedral in black ocean.
MC crosses a giant rune-ring boundary (halo gate); air-law changes.
Torn wings disintegrate into drifting letters.
MC falls through stacked refractive sheets (triangles→hexes→circles).
Silhouette glitches between godlike and human outlines each layer.
Alarm-like pings imply systemic detection.
World-Ladder reveal: countless world-bubbles stacked like lanterns on infinite spine.
Upper bubbles: huge/bright/dense essence; mid: dim; lower: tiny/cold embers.
MC is a small falling spark passing multiple layers without landing.
Inside mind: towering library. Doors shut shelf-by-shelf.
Shelves labeled by icons: Body, Mind, Spirit, Will, Law, Authority.
Veil threads chain-wrap doors; locks engage rhythmically.
One sealed door has a hairline crack.
Through crack: patterns not memories—breathing rhythm, meridian loop, single rune hint.
A thin thread of light leaks and follows MC downward.
Lowest sky: heavy grey cloud ceiling, starved of glow.
Upper world-ladder barely visible as faint distant points.
Corpse-cart rattles along muddy road; dumps bodies into ditch.
MC hits mud among corpses, no aura.
MC face half-submerged in mud; eyes snap open; cough blood.
MC forces upright; essence motes visible but thin as ash.
He tracks them instinctively.
He inhales a faint essence thread; it hits blocked meridians like needle into scar tissue.
Meridian-map overlay shows obstruction.
Boy tries to loot; MC catches wrist with frightening precision.
Glitch cue: faint rune flicker behind MC's eyes.
MC releases the wrist; notices the boy’s hunger/ribs.
MC reaches into torn robe; weak shimmer like pulling from between folds of reality.
Produces ration + sealed water flask.
Reveal debt-scar sigil on wrist/collarbone resembling ledger-stamp.
Suggest this mark anchors the crack.
MC trades ration + flask to boy.
Cost manifests: fingertips grey/frost line creeps, momentary weakness.

caption_fragments: Immutable Law: No knowledge survives Reversion.
panels.thought: I couldn’t keep the knowledge… so I kept the price tag.
visual_notes: Broken scale balancing law vs payment.
Crack-light thread visually tethered to debt-scar.

dialogue.speaker: AUDITOR
dialogue.text: A mortal carrying a debt-mark… and a crack.

dialogue.speaker: STREET_BOY
dialogue.text: If you die on the way, I keep the rest.

visual_notes: Top: far above, sigil-eye opens; Auditor turns with needle of light over an unseen map.
Bottom: MC sways but stands; boy looks greedy and afraid.
They walk from ditch toward town; MC staggers.
MC’s eyes track ash-thin essence motes.

dialogue.speaker: THUG
dialogue.text: One copper per look! Real cultivation!

visual_notes: Alley demonstration: coin hovers shakily—weak Will technique for money.

panels.thought: The cost is active… not paid in advance.
visual_notes: Debt-scar pulses; light line crawls upward then snaps back like a leash.

dialogue.speaker: STREET_BOY
dialogue.text: And curses get you cut open.

visual_notes: Herb/apothecary street: lanterns, drying racks, bitter steam.
Essence motes slightly thicker here (subtle density increase).

dialogue.speaker: SUYA
dialogue.text: You again? If you’re here to steal—

dialogue.speaker: STREET_BOY
dialogue.text: He’s dying and he has food and water and weird clothes.

visual_notes: Suya exits small shop carrying herb bundles; practical apprentice vibe.
Her eyes flick to MC’s wrist.
Suya locks onto debt-scar; ledger-like administrative aura (not demonic).

dialogue.speaker: SUYA
dialogue.text: We don’t treat Tribunal debts here.

visual_notes: Suya steps between MC and shop entrance.
Nearby shopkeepers glance; shutters/talismans subtly shift.

dialogue.speaker: MC
dialogue.text: I’m not here to harm your shop. I need herbs… to open what this world closed.

dialogue.speaker: SUYA
dialogue.text: If you’re lying, you’ll bring disaster to my door.

dialogue.speaker: MC
dialogue.text: If I’m lying, I won’t live long enough to regret it.

visual_notes: MC exhausted but controlled; Suya hesitant.
End beat: Suya must choose to help or report.
